meanings.definition: Showing a strong interest in or appreciation for the arts.
meanings.sent1: She has an artsy room filled with paintings and sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The gallery featured many artsy photographs taken by local artists.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at an artsy hairstyle ended up looking more like a mess.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in an artsy blend of colors.
meanings.sent5: The artsy atmosphere of the museum inspired her to create her own artwork.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a creative or imaginative style.
meanings.sent1: The artsy film used unique camera angles to tell the story.
meanings.sent2: Her artsy fashion sense always stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent3: The artsy cake she baked was a whimsical masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: His artsy mind was always coming up with new and innovative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The artsy design of the building drew admiration from all who passed by.

meanings.sent1: She acted so artsy, pretending to know everything about modern art.
meanings.sent2: The artsy director insisted on using avant-garde techniques in the play.
meanings.sent3: His artsy behavior at the party made everyone roll their eyes.
meanings.sent4: The artsy decorations at the event were over-the-top and unnecessary.
meanings.sent5: The artsy language in the book made it difficult for some readers to understand.
